item.description:
Ok, so to kick this thing off, let's meet during the second half of the Tuesday conversation group this week.

This week, we can finish Hana Mina's short story that we are reading in the Anthology of Arabic Lit.  I will also bring a really short story from the Arabic version of Chicken Soup for the Soul.  It's a much easier and lighter read, so I think we should be able to finish both in the hour.  Look in the files section under the heading "More" at the top of the page if you want to print out a copy of the story beforehand.

See you tonight!
item.name: Arabic Literature Study
